text: nı hmu phwk khea mi phu ngeiyhu fang cea cnkrathang meux phwk khea xxk pi cak cea phwk khea k ca phud kæ phu mi khwam ru wa meuxki ni khea (muhammad) phud xari kan chn hela ni hæla khux brrda phu thi xallxh.Thrng prathabtra bn hawcı khxng phwk khea læa phwk khea ptibati tam xarmn ta khxng phwk khea
